name: Beavis and Butt-Head Do U
description:
Beavis and Butt-Head Do U is an adventure game developed by Illusions and MTV Interactive. It came out on 01-01-1998. It was published by GT Interactive Software. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Beavis and Butt-Head Do U on PC.
James Coliz Jr. and Nathan Rose produced the game. It was directed by Darren Bartlett.
